sections.title: Executive Summary
sections.content: Premiums increased 8.4% YoY driven by commercial auto expansion. Combined ratio improved to 96.1 with a 2pt loss ratio reduction after fraud controls.

sections.title: Loss Ratio Detail
sections.content: Personal property loss ratio 57.2, commercial property 63.1. Catastrophe losses contained within 4.2pts. Average claim cycle time reduced to 18 days.

sections.title: Capital Adequacy
sections.content: Risk-Based Capital at 465% against a 375% target. Reinsurance program renewed with 12% lower attachment points due to better catastrophe modeling confidence.
